remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指字型的傾斜字型樣式： 一般、 斜體和傾斜。A font style refers to the slant of a font: normal, italic, and oblique. |字型樣式Font style|描述Description| |----------------|-----------------| |一般Normal|一般或明體，字型中的字元是垂直。The characters in a normal, or roman, font are upright.| |斜體Italic|斜體字斜體字型中的字元，並依照它們的設計。The characters in an italic font are truly slanted and appear as they were designed.| |傾斜Oblique|傾斜字型中的字元是人工地傾斜The characters in an oblique font are artificially slanted| 如，傾斜達成方式是從一般字型字元上執行的傾斜轉換。For , the slant is achieved by performing a shear transformation on the characters from a normal font. 無法使用電腦或印表機上，則為 true 的斜體字型時，可以從一般字型產生傾斜的樣式，並可用來模擬斜體字型。When a true italic font is not available on a computer or printer, an oblique style can be generated from the normal font and used to simulate an italic font. 下圖顯示 Palatino Linotype 字型的正常、 斜體和傾斜字型樣式。The following illustration shows the normal, italic, and oblique font styles for the Palatino Linotype font. 請注意如何斜體字型樣式有更流暢、 更引人注目的傾斜字型樣式，它只由扭曲文字的一般字型樣式版本比的外觀。Notice how the italic font style has a more flowing and visually appealing appearance than the oblique font style, which is simply created by skewing the normal font style version of the text. ![一般、 斜體和傾斜字型樣式](~/add/media/fontstyle01.PNG "正常、 斜體和傾斜字型樣式")![normal, italic, and oblique font styles](~/add/media/fontstyle01.PNG "normal, italic, and oblique font styles") 字型樣式的範例Example of font styles ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中， ， ，和用來定義的字型樣式物件。In the following code example, , , and are used to define the font styles for the objects.
